text: va onon, ki ʙa on ci ʙar tu nozil sud, Qur'on va hikmat (sunnat) va ʙar pajomʙaroni pes az tu monandi Tavrot, Incil va ƣajraho nozil sudaast, imon meovarand va ʙa oxirat ʙovar dorand. Ja'ne, zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidan va on ci dar on az hisoʙu cazo ast. Dar ojat zikri oxirat ʙajonsudaast, zero imon ovardan ʙa on az ʙuzurgtarin cizest, ki mu'mini parhezgorro ʙar icroi to'at vodor mekunad va az muharramot dur mesozad va ʙa muhosaʙai nafs ʙedor mekunad
